original: GLLL-BEKÖ, Erik Gustav Reinhold, Civilingenjör, Bromölla, f Målilla, Kalm l, 21/11 98 av stins A J G o Fanny Törnlöv, gm Fanny Dufwander. Studex Strängnäs 17, KTH (ma-skinbyggn o mek tekn) 20—24. Rit v Ford Motor Co Fordson Plant Detroit Mich USA 25—26, konstr v Detroit Edison Co 26—28, rit v Mechanical Handling Systems Inc Detroit 28, offert- o beräkn.ing v AB Sv Fläktfabr Sthlm 29—30, e. ing v Sthlms stads gatukont 30—34, konstr.lär i motortekn, flygmotorlära 0 maskinlära mm v Sthlms tekn inst 34, anst v AB Iföverken Bromölla sed. 35, entreprenadingenjör där. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: GLLL-BEKÖ, Erik Gustav Reinhold, Civil Engineer, Bromölla, born in Målilla, Kalmar County, on 21/11 1898, son of stationmaster A.J.G. and Fanny Törnlöv, married to Fanny Dufwander. High school graduate in Strängnäs 1917, studied at the Royal Institute of Technology (mechanical and structural engineering) 1920-1924. Worked as a drafter at Ford Motor Co Fordson Plant in Detroit, Michigan, USA, 1925-1926, designer at Detroit Edison Co 1926-1928, drafter at Mechanical Handling Systems Inc in Detroit 1928, involved in quotation and estimation at AB Svenska Fläktfabriken in Stockholm 1929-1930, civil engineer at the City of Stockholm Street Department 1930-1934, taught engineering subjects such as motor engineering, aviation engine theory, and mechanical engineering at Stockholm Technical Institute 1934, employed at AB Iföverken in Bromölla since 1935 as a construction engineer, currently working as a project engineer there. Member of the Swedish Society of Engineers (Sv. Tekniska Föreningen).
